name: Global Forestry Investments
overview:
Global Forestry Investments

Global Forestry Investments (GFI) is a company that is doing its part in the fight against climate change by offering ethical investments that are extremely competitive in the marketplace and are proven to have positive risk/return characteristics. By working with the local government of Paragominas, Brazil, the UK based company offers investments in Brazil’s forestry, which has been consistent in its high performance over a period of the past 100 years. It’s a win-win situation that ultimately builds and strengthens the local community and its infrastructure while providing consistent profits for the investor. The investment in Brazil’s forestry helps to support the regeneration of rainforests that are deforested as well as establishing a higher degree of stability for the local communities.

Investment in Brazil’s Economy

There are a number of factors that went into Global Forestry Investments’ choice to invest in Brazil. Brazil is home to one of the largest of the world’s economies and has been a major attraction to foreign investors. The political system is stable, the number of those unemployed is dropping, the currency is strong and inflation is low.

Addressing Climate Change and Carbon Offsetting with Trees

The continual increase in greenhouse gases due to climate change affects the amount of carbon dioxide present in the environment. GFI understands that investment in land that has been deforested and planted with living trees helps the process of carbon offsetting by absorbing carbon dioxide that is within the surrounding atmosphere. In this way, the investment helps to reduce the amount of carbon dioxide and other greenhouses gases.

Teak Trees as an Investment

Through Global Forestry Investments, investors can buy plots in Brazil that have been planted with well-established teak trees on land that was previously deforested in the Brazilian tropics. After allowing the trees to grow for some twenty-five years, they can be harvested and sold for a generous profit. During that time, the land can be leased out to local companies that will carry out maintenance and oversee the growing process. At different stages of maturity, the trees are thinned to leave room for the more mature trees, which is a process that generates additional income for the plot owner.

Improving Living Conditions for Local Residents in Brazil

By investing in Brazil’s forests, Global Forestry Investments has the opportunity to create jobs for the local residents of Para, which improves their standard of living. Another plan that has not yet been implemented is to build a Performing Arts and Sports Academy. Known as “Sky’s the Limit”, it will extend the children’s education into the arena of the arts and sports.
